properties.name: Beast of Bodmin Moor
properties.description: In British folklore, the Beast of Bodmin Moor, also known as the Beast of Bodmin[1] (Cornish: Best Goon Brenn) is a phantom wild cat purported to live in Cornwall, England, United Kingdom. Bodmin Moor became a centre of purported sightings after 1978, with occasional reports of mutilated slain livestock; the alleged panther-like cats of the same region came to be popularly known as the Beast of Bodmin Moor.
